text: Carmine John Persico Jr. (August 8, 1933 â€“ March 7, 2019), also known as "Junior", "The Snake" and "Immortal", was an American criminal and convicted racketeer. He was the long-time boss of the Colombo crime family from 1973 until his death. He was serving a sentence of 139 years in federal prison from 1987, until his death. He was born in Brooklyn, New York. Persico died on March 7, 2019 in Durham, North Carolina from complications of diabetes, aged 85.Carmine 'the Snake' Persico, Colombo crime family boss, dead at age 85 ==References== ==Other websites== * UNITED STATES OF AMERICA v.
